description.value: This cape smells faintly of brimstone. While wearing it, you can use it to cast Dimension Door|XPHB as a Magic|XPHB action. This property can't be used again until the next dawn. When you teleport with that spell, you leave behind a cloud of smoke. The space you left is Lightly Obscured|XPHB by that smoke until the end of your next turn.

_srdData.name: Cape of the Mountebank
entries: This cape smells faintly of brimstone. While wearing it, you can use it to cast {@spell Dimension Door|XPHB} as a {@action Magic|XPHB} action. This property can't be used again until the next dawn.
